text: The most dangerous criminal now is the entirely lawless modern philosopher. Compared to him, burglars and bigamists are essentially moral men.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: All men and women have an equal need for love. When these needs are not fulfilled it is easy to have our feelings hurt, for which we blame our partner.
author: John Gray

text: I do not consider it an insult, but rather a compliment to be called an agnostic. I do not pretend to know where many ignorant men are sure - that is all that agnosticism means.
author: Clarence Darrow

text: I like being a woman, even in a man's world. After all, men can't wear dresses, but we can wear the pants.
author: Whitney Houston

text: When women hold off from marrying men, we call it independence. When men hold off from marrying women, we call it fear of commitment.
author: Warren Farrell
